snippet.title: Man charged with murder after Sunshine West death
snippet.content: A 45-year-old man has been charged with murder following the death of a man at a home in Sunshine West. He was arrested at the McGregor Court property after the body of the 44-year-old victim was discovered about 8.30pm on Saturday. A 42-year-old woman, who was at the home at the time, was taken to hospital with non-life threatening injuries. The charged man faced an out-of-sessions court hearing and was remanded to face Melbourne Magistrates Court on Monday.
